name: Aeroelastic Typical Section Sim
short_description: This project solves the aeroelastic typical section problem using Simulink(R). The model considers both 2- (pitch and plunge) and 3-DOF (pitch, plunge and control surface) airfoil section. It allows the user to investigate the aeroelastic behavior of the airfoil at its critical stability boundary. Furthermore, it's possible to investigate several nonlinear behaviors. The unsteady aerodynamic loading is approximated by an augmented states technique. This is just a didactical application.
summary: Aeroelastic typical section solved in Simulink
